text:
He comprado esta arena seis veces en un poco m√°s de un a√±o. Siempre compro la bolsa de 18kg porque la relaci√≥n calidad-precio era bastante sensata. Buena calidad (aunque un poco inconsistente) y un precio accesible. Cuando la compr√© inicialmente, esta bolsa de 18kg me cost√≥ alrededor de 650 MXN, y lo m√°s caro que he llegado a pagar ha sido alrededor de 850 MXN, pero en general 4 de 6 veces la he comprado por debajo de 700 pesos. Posiblemente la marca est√° siendo impactada por los aranceles de Trumpito, pero el precio se ha elevado 100%, llegando a 1,400-1,500 MXN. Esto se me hace una barbaridad y exceso. Actualmente est√° por encima de los 1,000, pero este precio a√∫n se me hace caro cuando la calidad del producto no se me hace algo sobresaliente. La calidad es buena, pero es inconsistente, pues hay veces que la arena es m√°s polvosa y hay veces que las part√≠culas tienen un tama√±o que no producen tanto polvo. Esto ha sido notable √∫ltimamente en lo particular.

En fin, tengo en consideraci√≥n otras opciones m√°s econ√≥micas, que me dan los mismos resultados en cuanto a la absorci√≥n de olores y al tracking. En cuanto no bajen el precio, no comprar√© esta marca.

text:
Quise probar esta marca como alternativa a el costal de Scoop Away que compro en Costco y que tiene un precio muy competitivo.

Aroma: No tiene el desagradable y penetrante olor a ‚Äúlavanda‚Äù como la marca Scoop Away.

Lo malo: no se adhiere tanto a las heces.
Mi gato entierra sus desechos y a√∫n as√≠ no se adhiere tanto.

Tama√±o: Hay pedacitos de arena muy gruesos que se atoran en el cernidor.
Al no tener aromatizante no ‚Äúenmascara‚Äù tanto el olor de los desechos.
Pero limpiando el arenero diario dos veces al d√≠a esto no es un problema.

text: This litter is disgusting, i don‚Äôt know how anyone can stand it. I‚Äôve never seen any that track as much as this one. There‚Äôs no way to contain it. He will cross 5 diff rugs, 4 rooms, and this is still coming off of him, all the way into my bed. This is totally unsanitary and unhealthy. It also doesn‚Äôt even clump well if your cat likes to dig deep in the litter to pee or poo. If it sticks to the bottom it just crumbles to bits. No idea how this litter is rated well. Its the worst I‚Äôve ever tried. Gave one star for being unscented and not seemingly loaded with artificial chemicals. I don‚Äôt think my cat likes it either. text: The litter clumps well, and the cats had no issue using it at all. There was no noticeable odor, it did great at neutralizing it. I did not find myself needing to use a separate deodorizer. With cats not often being fond of strong smells, and having to worry about whether certain scents are unhealthy for cats, it is nice this is unscented. I did not find it to be dusty like many other low price clay litters. The price on this item is also very good compared to most other cat litters that provide the same quality. This works great in my home with two cats!

title: A great litter solution!

text: Dr. Elsey's cat litter is the absolute best litter I've ever used. It clumps very hard and stays together while being scooped so that I can scoop up the clump without it falling into pieces that slip right through the scooper! It is excellent on odor control too. I can't speak to the tracking outside the litter box as my cat has very long fur and thus has long clumps of fur between his toes! I doubt that there is a litter on this earth that could eliminate tracking but I can say that even with his furry toes there is less tracking. I love this litter - it has solved problems that no other litter I've tried has.
